name: Getting the story cards that belong to the Update Mingle Through Tests epic

testSteps.description: Given a Mingle server address of https://careerbuilder.mingle-api.thoughtworks.com/api/v2/projects/
And a Mingle project name of core_search
And a user name of apiadmin@careerbuilder.com
Given I want to retrieve all the cards belonging to the Update Mingle Through Tests epic
And I have created a request to get the cards that are assigned to this epic
When I send the request to the Mingle server
Then I should receive 1 cards in the response

userStory.narrative:
As a programmer
I want to retrieve Mingle cards
So that I can easily create feature files

title: Getting the story cards that belong to the Update Mingle Through Tests epic
